topic.title: Displaying Refset Members in the Hierarchy List

body.section: The result of a specification refset is a member refset, i.e., the set of conÂ­cepts specified by the specification refset. IHTSDO Workbench can be set to display which concepts are members of a particular member refset.

A diagonal paper clip icon next to a concept means that the concept is a member of the specified refset. A horizontal paper clip icon next to a concept indicates that one or more of its children is a member of the refset.
The display of these icons is enabled by dragging the desired member refset name onto the refset sub-tab, as shown in the previous section.
